**მარათონი ახალ წლამდე ⛄ **

ჩარიცხულია 170 ₾

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height = 1, fig.width = 8, dev.args=list(bg='transparent', pointsize=10)}

status <- c("income", "left")
x <- c("same", "same")
gel <- c(170, 3000)

df <- data.frame(status, gel, x)


ggplot(df, aes(x=x, y=gel, fill = status, color = "#7d9998")) + 
  geom_col(position = position_stack(reverse = TRUE)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = sort(gel)),
            hjust = 0, nudge_x = 0) +
  theme_void()+
  coord_flip()+
  theme(legend.position = "None")+
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#255251", "white"))+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#7d9998", "#7d9998"))


```

          options = list(searching=FALSE, pageLength=20, dom='Bfrtip'))
